'''Sigewinne''' is a playable {{Color|Ousia}}-aligned {{Hydro}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

Sigewinne is the resident head nurse of the [[Fortress of Meropide]]. In the past, Sigewinne chose to adopt a human appearance in order to save a young child she befriended at a time where [[Melusine]]s were looked down upon. However, her transformation was against [[Fontaine]] laws, resulting in her conviction to the Fortress of Meropide.
